Weekly Metrics Report - Week 11, March 2024
============================================

Executive Summary:
System performance remains within acceptable parameters. No critical incidents reported.

Key Performance Indicators:
- System Availability: 99.97%
- API Success Rate: 99.77%
- Mean Response Time: 142ms
- P95 Response Time: 385ms
- P99 Response Time: 892ms

Traffic Analysis:
- Peak concurrent users: 1,234
- Total requests: 1.2M
- Bandwidth consumed: 47.3 GB

Operational Notes:
- Completed planned maintenance window on Sunday
- Applied security patches to all servers
- Database backup verified successful

Action Items:
- Review alert thresholds for response time
- Plan capacity expansion for Q2
- Update monitoring dashboards
